author: Cheryl Winokur Munk
title: New Tax Law May Encourage Home Rentals
text:
The new tax law brought welcome news for people who rent out their homes for short periods. And it likely will entice even more people to do it.
To be sure, the tax rules are complicated and the Internal Revenue Service and the Treasury Department havenâ€™t issued the final regulations yet. But here are some ways short-term landlords could benefit:
Property-tax deductions
